title: Uncover The Revolutionary Zenarmor NGN Firewall's Advanced Capabilities
text:
In an increasingly digital world, network security is of utmost importance. With the continuous evolution of online risks, protecting your network environment is no longer a luxury but a necessity.
Zenarmor NG Firewall - A Revolutionary Solution:
Meet Zenarmor NG Firewall, the innovator in network security. This advanced firewall solution is crafted to tackle the constantly evolving challenges of online security directly.
This lightweight and robust, appliance-free technology allows businesses to deploy instant enterprise-grade firewalls when needed and effortlessly secure environments as tiny as home networks or scale to multi-cloud deployments.
Packet inspection core is capable to protect against sophisticated risks while also being so lightweight and nimble that it can even fit in limited hardware setups.
On-the-Fly Security:
Zenarmor introduces the concept of "Instant Firewalls." In today's dynamic, networked worlds, traditional security measures no longer suffice. Zenarmor provides instant security, adapting to the changing threat landscape in real-time.
This revolutionary solution is the industry's all-software technology providing exceptional deployment agility:
- Top-Notch Cloud-Based Control for Easily Managing Firewalls Across Multiple Locations
- All Software Architecture. Use Preferred Hardware While Expanding Your Network. No Hardware Lock-In.
- Zenarmor includes the industry's most advanced network analytics capabilities at no extra charge.
Zenarmor NGN Firewall Features:
Ultra-Fast Security Stack
Implement instant security without backhauling data packets back and forth between POPs and data centers.
Its single-pass architecture processes packets once and for all security controls.
The identical security stack runs whenever activated for an unprecedented level of consistency when applying security policies.
PREVENT EVASIVE THREATS WITH TLS INSPECTION
Unlike basic filters (e.g., DNS filtering), Zenarmor is equipped with a powerful Layer 7 content filter technology allowing you to employ sophisticated security mechanisms for detecting and blocking malware and threats which utilize advanced evasion techniques. Stop bad guys from abusing encryption.
Enable certificate-based or comprehensive TLS inspection to protect against encrypted threats.
Real-Time Defense Against Zero-Day Attacks
Realize the power of AI-based Cloud threat intelligence. Stop zero-day malware and phishing attacks in real-time. Detect and block new Botnets in an immediate.
Leverage Deep Content Inspection to prevent clever evasions that otherwise would bypass IP, port, and DNS-based filtering.
BLOCK HARMFUL CONTENT WITH PARENTAL CONTROLS
If you're a home network user, set the rules for your kids' screen activity.
You can
site web block sites like YouTube, TikTok, HouseParty (and many more) across all your family's connected devices.
Schedule offline time in advance so you can enjoy family time, make time for homework, or let kids finish their chores distraction-free.
Cloud-based management provides effortless management for anyone at home or on-the-go.
IMPROVE BUSINESS PRODUCTIVITY WITH APPLICATION CONTROL
Block and control unauthorized or misbehaving applications with Application Control.
EASILY TAKE CONTROL OF YOUR NETWORK WITH POLICY-BASED WEB FILTERING
Apply Security policies for more than 300 Million web sites under 60 different categories.
Create custom categories to blacklist or whitelist sites.
Zenarmor’s rich application database identifies thousands of applications regardless of port numbers.
DEVICE IDENTIFICATION
The introduction of device identification brings enhanced network visibility and management capabilities. Zenarmor 1.16 automatically detects devices and provides detailed information, including hardware vendor, operating system, device name, hostname, IP address, MAC address, and device category.
Universal Management:
Easily manage all your firewalls from the Cloud and in a single pane of glass.
Create centralized, location-independent policies. Enforce them across all IT environments.
Share your firewall management with your team.
ALWAYS BE IN-THE-KNOW WITH INDUSTRY'S BEST REPORTING:
Utilize industry's best network reporting. Be on top of everything that's going on your network. Create scheduled reports that deliver a clear picture of what's happening across your networks.
Delegate reporting on a need-to-know basis.
- Visualize your network in real-time
- Start from the big picture; drill down to per-connection details
- Spot anomalies visually as they occur
- Always stay up to date with daily/weekly security reports.
Benefits for Businesses and Individuals:
Zenarmor benefits both businesses and personal users alike. Businesses can enjoy strong security for their networks, while individuals can have confidence knowing their personal data is secure.
No HW Lock-In, all software architecture. Use Hardware of Your Choice while expanding and scaling your network.
In a world where online dangers are always changing, Zenarmor NG Firewall delivers instant enterprise-grade network security specifically designed for agility and efficiency by deploying in seconds on hardware you prefer.
With its AI and ML-based Threat Intelligence covering over 300M sites, Zenarmor brings industry-leading cybersecurity protection to your network in an immediate.
Optional Cloud Management allows you to easily create and manage granular access policies. – explore Zenarmor NGN Firewall today and fortify your network against the unknown.
